incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Our team has now ensured that https://one.one.one.one/ has the links available now.

As such, alternative download links are here:

https://1111-releases.cloudflareclient.com/mac/latest
https://1111-releases.cloudflareclient.com/win/latest

Cloudflare is aware of, and investigating an issue causing our WARP client downloads to be temporarily unavailable.
Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available, as well as an updated link for download.

We are working to analyse and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

incidents.name: Cache Purge Failures and Dashboard Errors

incident_updates.body: Customers using the Dashboard/Cloudflare APIs between 16:18 UTC and 16:29 UTC may have seen elevated errors on the dashboard and when trying to purge cache by tag/prefix/host and everything.
We have restored a batch of accounts, and we will continue to respond individual instances of deactivated legitimate accounts.
We continue to make progress and are close to restoring our first batch of accounts.
We have begun the process to return the impacted accounts to active.
We have identified the impacted accounts and are working on a resolution.

As part of Cloudflare's ongoing efforts to address suspected malicious activity, we have received reports that we may have improperly deactivated some legitimate accounts.  We are actively working on this.  Updates will follow shortly

Cloudflare is researching an issue with multiple users trying to login and not able to do so.

Updates will follow shortly.
